Query.Sentence: SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM ROOMS R INNER JOIN HOTELS H ON R.RM_HOTEL=H.ID_HOTEL INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPES RT ON RT.ID_ROOM_TYPE=R.RM_ROOM_TYPE WHERE R.ID_ROOM NOT IN (SELECT b.bk_room from bookings b WHERE B.BK_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL #WHERE_CONCAT#)

SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM ROOMS R LEFT JOIN BOOKINGS B ON B.BK_ROOM = R.ID_ROOM INNER JOIN HOTELS H ON R.RM_HOTEL=H.ID_HOTEL INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPES RT ON RT.ID_ROOM_TYPE=R.RM_ROOM_TYPE WHERE B.BK_ROOM IN (SELECT b.bk_room from bookings b WHERE B.BK_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL #WHERE_CONCAT#)
SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM ROOMS R LEFT JOIN BOOKINGS B ON B.BK_ROOM = R.ID_ROOM WHERE B.BK_CHECK_OUT=CURRENT_DATE #WHERE_CONCAT#

SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM ROOMS R LEFT JOIN BOOKINGS B ON B.BK_ROOM = R.ID_ROOM INNER JOIN HOTELS H ON R.RM_HOTEL=H.ID_HOTEL INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPES RT ON RT.ID_ROOM_TYPE=R.RM_ROOM_TYPE WHERE B.BK_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL #WHERE_CONCAT#

SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM ROOMS R LEFT JOIN BOOKINGS B ON B.BK_ROOM = R.ID_ROOM INNER JOIN HOTELS H ON R.RM_HOTEL=H.ID_HOTEL INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPES RT ON RT.ID_ROOM_TYPE=R.RM_ROOM_TYPE INNER JOIN CLIENTS C ON C.ID_CLIENT=B.BK_CLIENT WHERE B.BK_CHECK_IN>=CURRENT_DATE AND B.BK_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL #WHERE_CONCAT#
SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ROOMS R INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPES RT ON R.RM_ROOM_TYPE=RT.ID_ROOM_TYPE #WHERE#
